duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a 5-10k sq ft distribution center and the local warehouse operating team.
Recruit, lead, coach & retain a high-performing team of Shift Leads (3+) and Operations Associates (6+).
Responsible for ensuring high quality and maintaining key quality metrics including order accuracy and fulfillment speed.
Own the day-to-day operations of the DashMart warehouse, ensuring the site processes run smoothly, efficiently and safely.
Use data to identify pain-points or areas of inefficiency within the warehouse and current processes. Design, build and execute process improvement projects.
Work cross-functionally with central teams including inventory and training teams to provide the team with the tools and resources to achieve quality and operational goals.
Own scheduling and be responsible for managing a labor budget.
Use data to identify pain-points or areas of inefficiency within the warehouse and current processes. Design, build and execute process improvement projects.
Use data to identify pain-points or areas of inefficiency within the warehouse and current processes.
Work cross-functionally with central teams including inventory and training teams to provide the team with the tools and resources to achieve this goal.
Use data to identify pain-points or areas of inefficiency within our warehouse and current processes.
Design, build and execute process improvement projects to improve warehouse operations, quality metrics, and the employee experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Operations, Warehouse Logistics, Retail Management, Fulfillment, or related field (Master's preferred)
